Description:
Care, Quality & a Real Surprise
A picturesque facade gives this home a lovely feel with a large open verandah and a beautiful tree that frames the frontage but even more enticing is what is on the inside. Having been held by the same family for around 50 years this home has been extended and updated to make life easier and more enjoyable. With the spacious and solid kitchen that features the dishwasher, new stove, loads of bench space and walk-in-pantry which flows to the meals and living zone. Step through in the expansive lounge where you can watch the world go by from behind the significant Rylock windows. 3 large bedrooms each with built-in-robes and a renovated bathroom modified for special needs plus there is a second toilet and a split system for comfort. This solid home features a lush and private backyard which is lovely with a remote access garage and all of this is handy to Corio Shopping Central, schools, transport and offering seamless access to the Ring Road. A rare offering not to be missed.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 28 Princess Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Invest wisely.
A fantastic opportunity for those with a keen eye for value, ideal if you're looking to secure a place in the Norlane market and investors alike, this property is sure to spike your interest.
Set on a 556m2 (approx.) allotment the home offers a spacious & bright living area with an inviting ambience complete with split system air conditioning. The updated kitchen is fully functional with practical cooking space including ample bench tops, stainless steel oven and gas cooking with an adjoining dining area. The two bedrooms are generous size both with built in robes, serviced by the central bathroom and laundry near the rear.
Conveniently positioned overlooking Talona Reserve & within walking distance to sporting facilities, public transport, schools, and the Corio Shopping Centre. With only a short 10 minute commute to Geelong's CBD ensure you enquire today before you miss out!

Description:
So much potential.
Positioned in an ideal pocket lies this three bedroom brick home on a 669m2 (approx.) block. Adding to the appeal is the potential which provides investors, families and couples an excellent opportunity. The home features three spacious bedrooms, two with built in robes, large lounge area with gas heating and air conditioning which is situated beside the bright kitchen and dining area. The bathroom provides a bath and shower and there's a separate toilet and laundry all centrally located. Outside there is plenty of room in the back yard including a double car garage and a double carport. Located close to the Corio shopping precinct, schools and of course the Ring Road for easy access.

Description:
Investment/Development Opportunity
This beautiful 3 bedroom home is ideally located within a short stroll to transport, shops and parkland. Sitting on a level block of approximately 672sqm, future development opportunity exists (STCA). Beautifully presented, both bedrooms are spacious together with a large lounge room with lots of natural light and split system air conditioning. 3rd bedroom/bungalow is ideal for the teenager or as a craft/hobbie room. Kitchen complete with gas cooking facilities and adjoining meals area. Rear alfresco area overlooking a large rear yard which is ideal for the kids to play safely. Currently let at $210pw on a lease which expires in February 2020 allows you to reap the income now and develop the property later.

Description:
Ample room and plenty to enjoy.
Set on a large 610m2(approx.) block this meticulously maintained family home offers the new lucky owners the opportunity to just move in and enjoy. The master bedroom complete with full ensuite and built in robe with mirror doors is located at the front of the home. The other two generous size bedrooms, both with built in robes, are serviced by a central bathroom offering separate shower and bath, and separate toilet plus laundry. From the open plan formal lounge room with gas heating, ceiling fan and bay window you walk through to the well appointed kitchen/dining area providing quality appliances, plenty of bench space as well as gas cooking and heating.
Exit the home via the dining area through sliding glass doors to the under cover outdoor entertainment area which doubles as a handy spot to store the caravan. Other features of the home include a single carport, single garage with drive through access, two garden sheds, 2.5kw solar panels, low maintenance gardens, two water tanks and secure yard for the children or pets.
Insights: 12 Leonora Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Immaculate and Ease of Living
The ideal first home, downsizer or investment opportunity, this beautiful brick abode offers an updated kitchen flowing into the dining and lounge area and also opens out onto the outdoor undercover entertaining. The private and spacious rear yard provides plenty of space for the kids to play or to plant that garden and vegetable patch you have always wanted. There is the added bonus of ample car accommodation with a remote door leading to a double car port and garage, space that could also be used as a home gym or work shop. Both bedrooms feature built in robes, the updated bathroom boasts a double vanity and large shower. Enjoy comfort all year round with gas ducted heating, a split system and also electric roller shutters on the western side of the home. With easy access to the Geelong Ring Road and close proximity to both Corio and Bell Post Shopping Centres this home is one not to be missed!

Description:
Beautiful family home.
This spacious family home sits on a generous 567m2 (approx.) parcel of land and has plenty to offer.
Featuring four bedrooms, two with built in robes and the main with walk in robe and ensuite. The open plan kitchen/living/dining provides ample benchspace, pantry, breakfast bench, gas cooking and split system heating and cooling. The home offers a second formal dining room plus a second living area providing plenty of extra space for the larger families.
The main bathroom provides full bath, shower and vanity, while the toilet and laundry are both separate. Outside you will find a fully enclosed yard with double garage and spacious undercover entertaining area perfect for all occasions. All this is in a central position close by Corio Central, Geelong ring road, all major amenities are close at hand.

Description:
NO EXCUSES TO GET INTO THE MARKET!
Centrally located in the heart of the booming suburb of Corio, this 702m2 (approx.) parcel of land offers buyers the chance to secure your first home, family home or investment with most major amenities right on your doorstep. This neat home offers a large light filled lounge upon entry that flows effortlessly through to the original kitchen/meals area boasting plenty of bench space and gas cooking. The three very generous bedrooms are easily accessible to the central bathroom.
At the rear of the home is an undercover patio, single car garage and a lovely green garden suited for all the green thumbs out there.
Nestled right in the heart of Corio the home is surrounded by multiple reserves, quality schools, sporting facilities and the Melbourne Ring Road right at your door. Be sure to enquire quickly as this opportunity won't last long.
Features include;
- 702m2 (approx)
- External security roller shutters throughout
- Gas cooking
- SLUG
- 3 Bedrooms all with BIR's

Description:
The ultimate location.
Make no mistake this one owner family home, located in the heart of Corio, is too good to miss!
Close to local schools, Corio Shopping Centre, medical facilities and the Princes Highway only a few moments away this really is an ideal location.
A surprisingly large home presenting three comfortable sized bedrooms all with BIRs, formal lounge room, a great sized kitchen & dining area with plenty of potential, central bathroom and single carport.
Step outside and you will be greeted by an open decking area which is the perfect start for an undercover entertainment area and a separate bungalow at the back of the home with enough space for two extra bedrooms. Other features of the home include split system heating & cooling & 14 solar panels. The perfect opportunity to renovate or extend (STCA), this amazingly solid brick family home in a dream location won't last.

Description:
No Better Location Close To Corio Shopping Centre!
Situated in a quiet Court in a popular pocket of Corio renowned for its close proximity to Corio Shopping Centre, less than 10 mins walk to Northern Bay College (Goldsworthy), Northern Bay Family Centre, Goldsworthy Reserve (currently being completely re-done).
Norlane Waterworld (gym, indoor/outdoor pool) soon to be the brand new and state of the art Northern Arc Health & Wellbeing Hub, expected to open its doors mid-2019. Very easy access to the Ring Road with Melbourne under an hour away and Geelongs CBD less than 15 minutes, this is the perfect location for an investment, or somewhere for a family to set down their roots.
- 3 large bedrooms
- Central bathroom
- Renovated kitchen including gas cooktop, dishwasher & adjoining meals area
- Light filled lounge room with polished floor boards
- Ducted heating
- Split system A/C
- Currently tenanted at $300 p/w (month by month) perfect if someone wishes to occupy the home
- Entertaining deck looking over grassed yard
- Double Garage
- 540sqm (approx) allotment
Dont let an opportunity like this go to waste! Contact us today!

Description:
One For The Family.. Who Love To Entertain!
In the sought after Cloverdale Estate comes this immaculately presented family home that meets the needs of all family members. Offering 3 double bedrooms each with large built-in-robes and the master with en suite. A renovated and well appointed kitchen with ample bench and cupboard space that opens to the dining/living and flows to the large lounge and you can then step into the vast rumpus room. With gas heating and a split system the home is just as nice outside as inside. If you love to entertain the large alfresco will suit with blinds and the huge garage with a second kitchen and workshop area are very handy. The bonus of loads of parking behind secure fencing and dual parking space out the front not to mentioned the lovely yards add to the appeal with any modern family. This highly prized and quiet location is handy to schools, shops, transport and offers easy access to the Ring Road and once you inspect, everything else will seem inferior.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Like Finding Your Pot Of Gold
This generously sized home is in a convenient location and with great "bones" and is just waiting for that someone to give it some love, and then enjoy all this home has to offer. With a large lounge and updated kitchen plus 3 ample sized bedrooms each with built-in-robes. The home also features a near new stove and gas heater, evaporative cooling plus relatively new hot water unit. Head outside and enjoy the space or the large double tandem garage perfect for the next project or ready to be transformed into the ultimate "man cave". The home is well laid out for those with extra cars or toys and handy to so much with bus stops, schools, shops (including Corio Central) within a short stroll plus Ring Road access is merely a couple of turns. Bring your tool belt and get cracking on this amazing opportunity.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 137 Goldsworthy Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Stylish Entertainer
Offering convenience of location & living is this quality built home set in the heart of the Rose Park Estate. This stylish home is a perfect example of quality, space & style, ideal for families & entertainers alike.
Presenting 3 generous bedrooms, with a spacious dressing room & ensuite to complete the master suite. Bright central bathroom servicing the rear bedrooms plus a theatre room.
Stylish galley style kitchen adjoins the formal dining & generous living room with built-in storage.
Entertain in style all year round under the large 5.2 x 12.0 covered alfresco complete with built-in bar & rangehood completed with cafe blinds for all year round comfort. Drive through as well as internal access from the double garage, plus extra storage in the colourbond garage at the rear. Save on electricity bills with a 4 KW solar panel system.
Commute & travel with ease, with the Geelong Ring Road only a few minutes drive, plus all major amenities at your fingertips with the Corio Shopping Centre, medical facilities, schools, and public transport within a few minutes drive. Why settle for anything less than convenience and great location.
A possible rental return of $400 per week (approx)
Key Features
-3 Bedrooms, 2 Bathrooms
-Ensuite and extra large walk in robe/dressing room to master
-Open planing kitchen/living area & built-in shelving in living area
-Modern galley style kitchen with stainless steel appliances & built-in wine rack
-Home theatre room with projector & screen
-Large covered pergola with range hood, built-in cupboards & exposed aggregate
-Central heating split system air conditioning
-12x solar panels- 4KW system
-Large single color bond shed plus double garage with internal & drive through access
-Added storage cupboard & drying rails in the laundry
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
"Development Potential on 626m2 Block!
Situated in a central location within walking distance to schools, sporting facilities, medical facilities & public transport, this family home is one not to be missed! Boasting 3 generous sized bedrooms, kitchen with gas cooking & large living areas. Set on a large 626sqm block (approx) this property lends itself to future subdivision (STCA). Only 15 minutes to Geelong CBD & 45 minutes to Melbourne CBD. Currently receiving a rental return of $260 per week this would be a great investment to add to the portfolio. Don't miss this opportunity; blocks with this much potential don't come along too often!
3 Bedrooms
Central Location
Potential to Subdivide (STCA)

Description:
Stunning from start to finish.
Welcome to the absolute best Corio has to offer. Be captivated as you enter into this stunning property, you will be in awe of every detail the home owners have worked tirelessly to perfect. As you walk through the magnificent hallway you are greeted on the right to the large master bedroom which features a walk in robe and ensuite. On the left there is a bedroom which could also be used as a study. Further on is a third bedroom and the first of two living areas.
The large, bright open plan living/dining and kitchen is spectacular, the modern updated kitchen has been tastefully finished with quality appliances, gas stove top, dishwasher, stone bench tops providing ample storage and of course the breakfast bench perfect for the kids. Indulge in looking over the outdoor kitchenette/entertaining area through the multiple windows seamlessly adjoining the inside to outside. This beautifully finished alfresco features so much space and warmth for all kinds of entertaining from kids parties to Christmas gatherings.
A further two bedrooms with built in robes at the rear of the home are serviced by the main bathroom which features a full bath, shower and generous vanity. Separate toilet and laundry complete the layout of this home.
Outside there's so much space for almost any activity or game, side access for a caravan or boat to be stored, a double remote garage and it's all low maintenance.
Other features include cosy ducted heating and evaporative cooling.
Insights: 2-4 McCubbin Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 2 other 5 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.
